revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 49:;Aphrodisia, daughter of Ischyrion (Plimiatis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 10)eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Tasoucharion, daughter of Ptolemaios through the agency of Melanas, son of Pakysis (Sarouilla);;orchard taxes for the 12th year. apomoira drachmas 2 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 27) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 6 obol 1;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 4, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7obol 0.5 chalki 2);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obol 1.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2;;tax on land in release likewise obols 3, surcharges obols 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4;;Julius Prolemaios (Maximimus, leper);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 39 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 5 obols 3, naubion drachmas 3 obols 5.5, surcharges drachmas 9 obols 4.5;;(in total: drachmas 88 obols 6) eparourion drachmas 26 obol 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obol 1.5, kollybos drachma 1 obols 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 88 obol 1 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Satabous, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petheus, mother Charis, drachmas 8;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 284 obols 12;;(Pharmouthi) 9 likewise:;Apitas, son of Chairemon, grandson of Apitas, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Sempronius Klemes (Panataeis);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas (Pkiatiap);;orchard taxes for the 12th year, apomoira drachmas 5 obols 5.5 chalki 2, tax (in left margin: drachmas 28 obols 21)on the produce of olives obols 5, naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3;;eparourion drachmas 4, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1.5, 13 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;geometria drachmas 4, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obols 1.5, in total drachmas 15 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3 chalki 2;;Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, obols 28;;Petaus, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Chairemon, grandson of Sambas, mother Sokratiaine, drachmas 16;;Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Phasis, mother Helene, obols 28;;Didymos, son of Heron, grandson of Heras, mother Tasiaipis, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
